title: Wake up Art Cullagh
content:
Wake up Art Cullagh Type Quest Act Act 2 Location Shadow-Cursed Lands Reward Clue of Lift the Shadow Curse

Wake up Art Cullagh

Wake up Art Cullagh is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Wake up Art Cullagh can be acquired during Act 2. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Wake up Art Cullagh Objectives

Find some clues about Art. Tell Halsin about Art Cullagh. Investigate
